title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal preference, which is not clear to users. I believe all actions should be reachable from the editor, either in the context menu or in a global menu.
OB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" is not available when selecting text.
EB: I expected the action "Add Javadoc Comment" to be available when I select text.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Check for the presence of the "Add Javadoc Comment" action in the context menu or a global menu.
